Contact Related Information: Contact George Brown College for information sessions, domestic and international admissions, fees and financial assistance, and advice on program options. Reach out to specific offices via email or phone: Admissions (admissions@georgebrown.ca, 416-415-5000 ext. 2160), Financial Aid (FinAid@georgebrown.ca), Entry Advising (appointment), Centre for Business (business@georgebrown.ca, 416-415-5000 ext. 2160), and program coordinators like Robin Yap (ryap@georgebrown.ca). International inquiries can be made through virtual meetings or the International Contact Us page. Follow Centre for Business on Instagram and LinkedIn.
